channel.title: Pseudo-Sciences on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Pseudo-Sciences on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Fr√¶uds
item.description:
I have a strange relation with this type of content. I may get attracted to availability and perceived richness of content. But then I’ll get discouraged because it often may end-up being some story-telling.

Anyway social skills have a good marginal utility for me so I got to check what is there on the surface.

One book named “Surrounded by Idiots” was reviewed as being very useful for the HR and managerial crowd.
